content: size depending on yarn size ~ 3 tall x 12 circumference ~ 50 yds #4 medium weight yarn knitting needles size us 8 5mm yarn needle for sewing in ends small amount of stuffing a small cinnamon stick or found stick glue gauge is not important for this pattern pattern notes the only stitches used in this pattern are the knit stitch and the purl stitch the pumpkin is knit flat and then stitches are gathered on one end sewn up the side and stuffed and then beginning stitches are gathered and secured to achieve the look of a pumpkin the stick is then glued into place to finish let s stay in touch enjoy an extra 10% off future purchases when you sign up for my free knitting knicely newsletter 1 1 https //knitting-knicely aweb page/newsletter
